Data Catalog CLI

dcat
    [--version]
    [-v | -q]
    [--log-file LOG_FILE]
    [--debug]
    [--host HOSTNAME]
    [--port PORT]
    [--username USERNAME]
    [--password PASSWORD]
    [--database DATABASE]
    [--api-server API_URL]
    [--token ACCESS_TOKEN]
--version¶

show program’s version number and exit

-v, --verbose¶

Increase verbosity of output. Can be repeated.

-q, --quiet¶

Suppress output except warnings and errors.

--log-file <LOG_FILE>¶

Specify a file to log output. Disabled by default.

--debug¶

Show tracebacks on errors.

--host HOSTNAME¶

MongoDB hostname

--port PORT¶

MongoDB port

--username USERNAME¶

MongoDB username

--password PASSWORD¶

MongoDB password

--database DATABASE¶

MongoDB database

--api-server API_URL¶

TACC API server URL

--token ACCESS_TOKEN¶

TACC API access token

challenge show¶

Get one challenge problem

dcat challenge show
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [--flatten]
    IDENTIFIER
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

IDENTIFIER¶

uuid or id

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

challenges list¶

List challenge problems

dcat challenges list
    [-f {csv,json,table,value,yaml}]
    [--quote {all,minimal,none,nonnumeric}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [-l,--limit LIMIT]
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

--quote <QUOTE_MODE>¶

when to include quotes, defaults to nonnumeric

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

-l,--limit <LIMIT>¶

Return first [l] records

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

experiment show¶

Show one experiment

dcat experiment show
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [--flatten]
    IDENTIFIER
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

IDENTIFIER¶

uuid or experiment_id

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

dcat experiment-design show
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

IDENTIFIER¶

-i, --ids¶

file get¶

Download a file by identifier

dcat file get [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-O OUTPUT] identifier
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-O <OUTPUT>, --output <OUTPUT>¶

Destination file path

identifier¶

uuid, file_id, or name

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

file show¶

Show one file by identifier

dcat file show
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [--flatten]
    IDENTIFIER
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

IDENTIFIER¶

uuid, file_id, or name

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

List managed files

dcat files list
    [-f {csv,json,table,value,yaml}]
    [--quote {all,minimal,none,nonnumeric}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [-l,--limit LIMIT]
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

--quote <QUOTE_MODE>¶

when to include quotes, defaults to nonnumeric

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

-l,--limit <LIMIT>¶

Return first [l] records

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

id show¶

Get a record by one of its identifiers

dcat id show
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [--flatten]
    identifier
    [field]
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

identifier¶

Data Catalog identifier

field¶

Field from record (optional)

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

job event send¶

Send an event to a pipeline job

dcat job event send
    [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}]
    [-x]
    [-i]
    [--flatten]
    [--data DATA]
    [--async]
    [--manager MANAGER]
    [--nonce NONCE]
    [--token TOKEN]
    [--key <admin-key>]
    [-F FILE]
    IDENTIFIER
    [event_name]
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

-x, --extended¶

Return all fields

-i, --ids¶

Return identifiers only

--flatten¶

Flatten complex field values

--data <DATA>¶

Event payload (JSON)

--async¶

Do not wait for event response

--manager <MANAGER>¶

Jobs Manager actorId or actorAlias

--nonce <NONCE>¶

Jobs Manager authorization nonce

--token <TOKEN>¶

Admin token

--key <admin-key>¶

Key for generating an admin token

-F <FILE>, --file <FILE>¶

Load event definition from file

IDENTIFIER¶

Pipeline Job UUID

event_name¶

Pipeline Job event name

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

job events show¶

Show a pipeline job’s event history

dcat job events show
    [-f {csv,json,table,value,yaml}]
    [--quote {all,minimal,none,nonnumeric}]
    identifier
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

--quote <QUOTE_MODE>¶

when to include quotes, defaults to nonnumeric

identifier¶

Pipeline Job UUID

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

token show¶

Return current administrative token

dcat token show [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [--key <admin-key>]
-f <FORMATTER>, --format <FORMATTER>¶

the output format, defaults to table

--key <admin-key>¶

Admin token key

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.

version¶

Show Data Catalog schema and code version.

dcat version

This command is provided by the dc-cli plugin.
